website_summaries.verdict: From planning a backyard cookout, to dealing with vampire neighbors, The Sims 4 presents longtime fans of the series with more to enjoy with than ever before.
pros: Completely customize your Sim family’s home and life
Tons of optional and fun expansion packs available
Many hilarious Sim reactions to discover
cons: You can spend a lot trying to collect all of the expansions

website_summaries.verdict: The latest mainline game in The Sims series boasts an impressively detailed Sim creator, tons of all-new home objects, and a dizzying array of bonus expansions to keep fans engaged.
pros: Available for PC, Xbox One, and PS4
Create Sims with distinct appearances and personalities
Tons of expansion packs to keep the game fresh
Easy to build the perfect home
cons: There are so many additional expansion packs, only the most dedicated fans will buy them all

customer_reviews.title: warning for the used games
customer_reviews.text: i was very excited that i was finally going to get this game, yet when i inserted the disk, the two day demo only appeared. i searched up what was wrong, but apparently, you are not able to use this if the person you had brought the game from has already been played with it. this is why if the person will no longer be using this game either throw it away, or give the buyer the information of their origin account ( if they are comfortable with it of course ). as soon as i found this out, i had to return it right away.
customer_reviews.author: DIANA

customer_reviews.title: I got this for $20!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this on prime day!! I was so hesitant to pay 60 dollars for it at the store. I was a little worried when I read some of the reviews that said their product codes were already used. Thankfully mine worked and I've been having a really fun time playing ever since!!
customer_reviews.author: Halston Blake

customer_reviews.title: The worst change to the game
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that they took the world map away from Sims 3 where you could see your sims walk, jog, and/or drive to place to place. It's like they took a step backwards. now it's like when you go somewhere you get a loading screen and then you appear at your location. They need to bring this feature back.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Smith

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend for hardcore simmers
customer_reviews.text: Stick to sims 3. I do not recommend for hardcore simmers, really only good for newbies.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beware Clean Earth Books
customer_reviews.text: We received a sealed package. My daughter installed the game and I assumed all was well. Then when I tried to play it I found the program was not recognized by EA/Origin. After multiple emails and phone calls EA confirmed the product code had been already used *months* ago. Some sellers have inflexible return policies...do not wait to confirm your install!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Steve

customer_reviews.title: It's a game box full of confusion!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hard disc but the website would not accept the activation code or obviously allow me to play it after installing it. I called EA's customer service, which put me in contact with Origin and it turns out the disc was pretty much useless for all practical purposes. However, I was able to install the game by using that same code with the assistance and guidance of one of Origin's customer service agents, which by the way, their customer service is outstanding! In the end everything worked out, but the actual disc I purchased on this transaction is apparently still useless for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Manny M.

customer_reviews.title: You're just leasing it, sort of.
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy the game. Really don't enjoy Origin. It's not my game, although I paid for it, it's theirs and they control how and when I play. 6/22 -- another update resulting in corrupted mods. This time I decided not to "fix" it after being advised by tech support to "stop using mods". I uninstalled the game, deleted Origin account. All fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bredt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...doesn't even compare to Sims 2 or 3
customer_reviews.text: Now I understand what the reviews were about. I've been a die-hard Sims fan since the original Sims 1 and have all the games and expansion packs. Sims 4 pales in comparison to the previous versions. Both Sims 2 and 3 are way better. Sims 4 has nice graphics and character creation, but they've stripped the game down so much that there is little to do. It makes the game boring until more content could be added. It's actually very disappointing. I'm glad I waiting for the $29.99 sale, but it's not even worth that much. I'd say it's more worth around $19.99. Very disappointing...I hope that future Sims games improve. I was looking forward to being impressed...not this time.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppergal70

customer_reviews.title: Great game, lousy way to play
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Sims game to play out of all of them—the graphics and features are the best, and the Sim and house creation tools are super easy and flexible—but Origin is a pain to work with. I don’t know why Maxis made a deal with that platform; I didn’t have internet at the time I bought this, so I had to hop onto a business WiFi for a few HOURS to install the game, which is ridiculous because I HAD THE DISK. Can’t play it without going through Origin first. If you don’t have fast internet, beware.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Horse

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun! The only complaint is to download onto your ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun! The only complaint is to download onto your computer you have to first download origin, then download the game onto that playing system. It's confusing and after two hours of trying to download origin, it took overnight to download sims so I didn't even get to play it yet. And I've seen comments from people who say it took days for their games to download
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Quiggle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Game. We have called customer service on 3 separate occasions and no one is able to help us log in so that our daughter can play the game absolutely horrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun at first, but can get boring
customer_reviews.text: Usually, playing this game overheats my Mac. The appeal of the game is great, but it gets boring easily without expansion packs, which are pricy. I suggest getting them when there’s seasonal sales, or turning on mods and downloading them from the internet so that you get new content.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Only Got Disc 2 And Code- Unplayable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game from a third party seller because the option to by through EA wasn't available. When it arrived and I opened it I noticed it only had one disc (disc 2) in the case and the installation code on the pamphlet inside the case. I thought "maybe it's different for installation now?" But I was wrong. It still needs disc 1 as well to install, which it did not come with, so I just wasted $31 on a game I can't play.
customer_reviews.author: Zakery R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Makes me miss Sims 3
customer_reviews.text: This game more of a "Sims for dummies" game. I mainly like to build and a lot of features are not in this version that was in Sims 3. No split level stairs (not even with cheats) and no creat a style. The create a sim feature is weird: while you can tweak details of a person, you are stuck with very few options on personality, interests, and clothing options. I hope their expansion packs bring some improvements but at $39 a pop, you're better off playing Sims 3.
customer_reviews.author: Trelaine

customer_reviews.title: All the hype for...
customer_reviews.text: I was so hoping that the Sims 4 would top the already amazing Sims 3. But it really didn't. The characters look too cartoonish. And it seems more difficult rather than easier to build houses. There are no toddlers which sucks. And the fact that you can just click the "needs" instead of manually going to the object and making the sim go there makes it quicker but pointless because it feels like you aren't really doing anything. I went back to Sims 3 because I just wasn't too happy with this game. If they come out with expansions I will try it again. But for right now, I really am not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: We have tried everything and it does not want to operate correctly. We have a very expensive, newer (2019) computer with windows 10 and it just does not want to work. To me a waste of money. If you visit Youtube you will see that there are clearly issues with this program working 100% correctly on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Skyent

customer_reviews.title: Why did I buy this game?
customer_reviews.text: Another semi-broken game by EA/Origin. There's a big issue with the online community, and that is that you can't get in, because the game says online is unavailable. I'm not the only one to experience this issue. I even looked for help, but none the the solutions has worked for me as of yet. :(
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Perfect play on my 2010 MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: We were a little skeptical how well this would work in a Mac but it’s working perfect, no lag. Install Mac specific instructions were exact. Using on a 2010 MacBook Pro with 16GB RAM, Intel Dual Core and GeForce Nvidia 320M.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: A lot of Work, but Worth It For The Game
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I like having the CD'S to the Sims games, but when it arrived their was only the CD's no product code. When I spoke to Amazon they told me they always send the CD's without codes when I tried to tell them that you can't play the game without those codes they directed my call to EA. Where they gave me the game over Origin. But the game it self if definitely 10/5 I love the new details in the games how each Sim can different from each other.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very buggy, frustrating experience
customer_reviews.text: We've had a steady stream of problems since buying the game. Initially it worked ok and my daughter played for many hours with no issues. Then we had a problem with an update and had to reinstall the game and have been unable to load her saved games back into the files. Currently the game is unplayable (not entirely sure why it won't load) so I guess well have to reinstall it or scrap the game entirely. We don't have the extensive history with Sims that many reviewers have but it strikes me that EA doesn't really care that much about the PC platform and pushes out upgrades before they ready. Good way to destroy the brand.
customer_reviews.author: D. Meier

customer_reviews.title: Great game but additional purchases may be needed.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen tons of gameplay and the game is truly fun. However I am giving it 4 stars, because in order to truly experience the game’s full potential you must buy custom content. The installation was fast and simple, I am looking forward for a new sims game .
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Playing since the original
customer_reviews.text: Been playing since sims 1. I wasn’t that big a fan of sims 3 wasn’t my favorite but sims 4 is definitely better. I love it and it’s super fun. Be warned you can lose a lot of time playing this.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: I specifically purchased this game because it said it was compatible with Windows 10 - which was a bold face lie. I say it's a lie because apparently many folks have been having problems with this issue and Origin has just been collecting the complaints/issues for some future remediation - if at all. How about remediate my money back and be honest with your specs?
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Face it, your life sucks. That's why you're here
customer_reviews.text: Live out your fantasy life. Marry a hot guy. Be super rich. Have your dream job. Drown your neighbors in the pool by removing the ladder. Wait what?
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stanley

customer_reviews.title: I love my sims!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sims! I've been playing since the original years ago! Fun game and awesome graphics. This is a disc not the code so you have to wait a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are nicer and it runs smoother than Sims 3 but it is just such a pain to figure out and I feel like you can't customise nearly as much as Sims 3 making it very boring fast for someone like me who just enjoys the design part of this. At least now your Sims don't just put the baby on the floor and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Rooster

customer_reviews.title: For Windows you have
customer_reviews.text: For Windows you have to download another game app to use the game. And in the app you have to download the game online. Not a problem if you have good high speed internet. We have centurylink and they are pretty hit and miss. I don't know if I will be able to download the game. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, fun to play
customer_reviews.text: This game of life is entertaining for the entire family. Easy to set up you own sim, have interactions with other sims. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: GregC

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Disc of Sims 4 and it wouldnt install. Even though I had More than the minimum system requiremtents it wouldnt install. Im returning immediately. Not worth trying to fight with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. / B. Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I've been a sims player forever and I'd have to say that sims 3 has got this one beat for sure. I love that on the sims 3 you can follow your sim when they leave there house in a vehicle but this game you can't. It's completely different that the sims 3. I was just hoping it would be a better version of it. But other than that I'll have to play it for a bit to understand it better.
customer_reviews.author: Darion

customer_reviews.title: Seller is great! Game is annoying to install
customer_reviews.text: I typically love this Sims. Ive played since they first came out, but this game doesn't install or download conveniently at all and you need an internet connection to even begin the process. Waist of time and money from EA. The seller here was great though!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: The lack of open world and extremely limited ability to customize just about anything like you could in Sims3
customer_reviews.text: Was all excited for what must be improvements only to be severely let down. The lack of open world and extremely limited ability to customize just about anything like you could in Sims3.
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: Uninteresting game play.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not thrilled with this game. If you loved the detail of Sims 3 then don't get this. This does not have very in depth game play. It's very lite play.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Fun game. It really performs much better than Sims ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. It really performs much better than Sims 3, although I do miss some of the features of that game. However, new features are enjoyable, and they're continuously working on it. I just wonder when they're gonna add octagonal roofs...
customer_reviews.author: Karin Elofsson

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for our son. He loves it! Best of all he is able to put his creative mind to good use building and decorating his own home. I've added a picture of the requirements in case you wish to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Classylady

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Gotta LOVE the Sims. Great building options in this version and the graphics are on point. The gameplay is different from 2 & 3 in that the world is not seamless anymore. Need to buy the Go To Work expansion for employment fun... But you can go on vacation! Sim creation is REALLY detailed as usual, and I spend hours building people and homes, so that is definitely my favorite part. I just need a billion dollars so I can download MORE expansions.
customer_reviews.author: Kristofer Dangcil

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a simaholic so this was very satisfying to get. Package came in a cute little pink wrapping with hearts. One thing I didn't expect was how the discs worked. It applies the game to your origin account which you must get before and there are two discs to verify that it's really a person, so very secure. Overall, I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Chevalier

customer_reviews.title: Even the DVD is digital download (only) for MAC
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for my g/dau to play while visiting. To my surprised, when it arrived, I discovered this Mac version is Digital Download ONLY. The disk work ONLY for windows. Bought the DVD version as I have DSL (slow downloads) and it tool all day to download the app. Maybe its in the description but cant find it. On the upside, the digital is 60, the disk is 30 - and if your on a Mac, your going to end up with a digital anyway so get the disk and save 30 bucks. Just know you're going to have to download it
customer_reviews.author: Diivious

customer_reviews.title: I always loved Sim games
customer_reviews.text: I always loved Sim games. Unfortunately I was bummed when i upgraded my laptop and could no longer play Sims 2. I had a lot of expansions for that version. However I am getting used to the Sims4. I miss getting the paper, going on dates and getting roses if it went well even the seasons. Hopefully this expansion pack will be added to the Sims4
customer_reviews.author: Midnightsuga

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Got the game and it would not download onto my computer. Tried to download origin and enter the game code, and the code had already been used. Useless. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as used but great condition. We cannot use this as the code in the package will not work because it has already been used and the disc won’t work without that. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this game, and I received it in record time even without Amazon Prime. The game was easy to install and begin. The new details of the game are incredible and the free play is a lot more interactive and fun. Building has never been better and the cheats certainly come in handy. The only downside I can think is the constant updates. They keep on coming and seem to never stop and they can take some time to download and install.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!  it runs on Origin which is so flawed that it won't let SIMS work
customer_reviews.text: Origin is flawed and stopped connecting online so SIMS won't work on any of my computers. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this is a Christmas gift for my daughter last ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this is a Christmas gift for my daughter last year. She absolutely loves the game and it works flawlessly on her computer. Don't know what else to say beyond that
customer_reviews.author: Mike B. single father and family shopper

customer_reviews.title: BLAH!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand what the disc was for!! Had to still download it from the internet which literally took HOURS!! Bought it for my daughter and wish i hadn't. Waste of money. Can't even play it on her pc sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Daughter likes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter must really like this game because she's playing way too much and now we fight when I tell her to turn it off. Must be good not too sure haven't played it myself
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Sims 4
customer_reviews.text: If you want a really good sims game I'd stick with the sims 3 and save some money. Unless they make some really great expansion packs it's really not worth it and pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the disk just go to origin
customer_reviews.text: Could have bought it from origin for $5. This disk just installs origin then the base game and then you download the updates. Could have saved $15.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother getting a used pc game.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have a useful code to allow play. When I called the company for a new code they gave me another that would not work. Wasted my money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Davis

customer_reviews.title: limited access unless you want to by all the expansions
customer_reviews.text: the sims games are still fun but they seems to be going up in price and down in limitations unless you want to by expansion packs which seem to be the same price if not more then the basic game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t download origin from the disk like I did
customer_reviews.text: Don’t download origin from the disk like I did. It crashes and I had to call technical support to gt the game up. Download origin from its original website and the prides is much easier. The game is amazing I love it. And couldn’t stop playing the second I had it running
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours and hours of fun!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this game like omg. I've always wanted to play it on a computer but never had a chance. Now I have a computer and I cannot get enough. This game has really showed me that I still have that inner child inside with vast amount of imagination. I've bought a couple of the expansions and they really boosted the experience. I highly recommend this game to people who love to create and use their imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Big papi

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! I usually run it online through Orbit instead of using the discs. It has a little trouble starting up sometimes but that’s probably just my computer. Once I get it to start it works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Duran

customer_reviews.title: Runs Smoothly,
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to download but took quite awhile. Was grateful to have the windows & Mac version 2 play on different devices. So far it's running smoothly & enjoying some of the changes from the Sims3 version. My daughter & son both like playing this too.
customer_reviews.author: MarQuette Mason

customer_reviews.title: Best game
customer_reviews.text: Best game every. Not digging the origin part and needing to be online. Especially since it doesn't save the game to the servers - but still The best game
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V. Galasso

customer_reviews.title: Can't install without installing another program first
customer_reviews.text: Fun game; although a pain in the neck to install. Had to install another program (can't remember the name of that program) in order to get this to install.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Fun but I didn’t look into what I was buying and didn’t realize the cats and dogs package didn’t come with it. But that was totally my mistake so make sure your aware of what your buying.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work. I think this is for an old version computer or something. Wont work with newer computers.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she’s in love with this game. Now she wants the pet expansion pack.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Gray

customer_reviews.title: I can't stop playing! :(
customer_reviews.text: I was... still am a die-hard Sims fan. Sims 4 is great, especially since I have a Mac and the download is included for my Mac and I can also install it on my PC with the same activation code. The gameplay of this version is WAY cool- the city and buy/build/design mode... meh, but I still love this game.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: It was ok but wasn't as much fun as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a gamer but I tried this game out anyway. It was ok but wasn't as much fun as I thought. it can get a little repetitive from time to time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Devastated
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I liked was when it came earlier than what it said but other wise I got scammed I couldn’t even play the game and I was so excited and no I’m really disappointed waste of my time and money and Excitement
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my nephew and he had no trouble ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew and he had no trouble downloading it onto the computer and he loves playing it. He is playing it every chance he gets.
customer_reviews.author: D Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Buy used at your own risk.
customer_reviews.text: Why sell a used copy of a game if the "installation code" is useless? Steer clear of this one; if its used, you will be buying a 28 dollar piece of worthless software.
customer_reviews.author: Baron Samedi34

customer_reviews.title: Not for Win 10
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was so looking forward to playing this but not compatible with Windows 10
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fun and addicting
customer_reviews.text: Love the Sims series. Very addicting and fun. Sims 4 is no different. Another addicting and fun game. Graphics are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Phil_-E-_Phil

customer_reviews.title: I love the game
customer_reviews.text: A love the game, although the directions weren't so straight forward, I spent about an hour drawing to downloaded and had to look at multiply videos, I guess it depends on the laptop on how easy it is to download, but after I downloaded it it worked amazing, I love it and a tip is to get custom content instead of buying add-ons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Costs too much, delivers too little.
customer_reviews.text: Played it for a few hours. Felt like that was all I needed, there wasn't a hell of a lot left to do. Rather a boring game, which is odd because I've loved all the other Sims games.
customer_reviews.author: krale

customer_reviews.title: Good game, bad application
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy playing sims and that is the o my good thing I got from this. I bought the disk version because i wanted to avoid having problems installing that game, i got the package and it had the disks BUT the disks could only be used on windows (i have a Mac and i got the version for both Mac and pc). This really annoyed me because I had bought the dusk version just so I wouldn’t have to try and input the code, but ended up having to use a code anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the new interactions on the Sims 4. Ive been a long time fan
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Sims 4
customer_reviews.text: I loved Sims2 this works fine. Wish I could play Sims2 with some of the graphic improvements that this presents, it would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was amazing it arrived within 2-3 days but the downloading process was long and the graphics didn't meet my expectations this is defiantly a disappointment for all in the sims community, If you're thinking about buying this product I would recommend rethinking and just buy the sims 3, its much better, better graphics, less difficult to download, great gameplay even better if you have expansion packs!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Returning this garbage
customer_reviews.text: Will not install game from disk. Wants me to download 10 gig game online. Frustrated as this was a birthday gift for my daughter. EA games suck.
customer_reviews.author: Shuler Construction

customer_reviews.title: Can’t even play it!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t give any stars. Origin wouldn’t download until finally and when I was trying to install the actual game it got to 98% and wouldn’t let me install it completely. Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My favorite game i highly recommend buy it's a little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: I personally don't like how EA handled this product
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't like how EA handled this product. The fact that it's tied to an account and only one copy applies to one person is terrible. At launch this game was expensive and you just want to share this with a friend because you're both broke and just want to enjoy a game.
customer_reviews.author: S Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Prompt shipping. My daughter loves the game.
customer_reviews.author: Evan C Hoeltge

customer_reviews.title: Buy new, Not used.
customer_reviews.text: Will not work because the code in the box has already been used, make sure to buy a brand new game not a used one.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Echazabal

customer_reviews.title: but it arrived as promised and has worked beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: This was my daughter's (15 years old) heart's desire. She saved for weeks and scoured online reviews prior to purchasing. She was a little skeptical about prompt shipping, but it arrived as promised and has worked beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Jomiacorey

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. What a waste
customer_reviews.text: The disc never worked and I am unable to get my money back. Very disappointed. What a waste. I wish I could give 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was satisfied but game didn't work on my PC, as a good sales person a return/refund was granted with no issue ...Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Works on Macs too!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I thought it might not work on the Mac, but you just have to use the download code they supply you and you are all set. This $10 price makes it worth it since it is normally $40, and you get more bang for your buck since the game just isn't worth $40 without any of the expansion packs
customer_reviews.author: Gregorio

customer_reviews.title: wonderful, fun, creative game.
customer_reviews.text: best PC game, hands down. I love creating homes and people and it's so cool. I can play this for HOURS on end.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it arrived as complete 2disc set.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars had it worked. Case only came with disc 2 when disc 1 was required. But the company handled very well, great customer service.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought this, says it's a trial and now I can't play it at all. Very frustrating!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came on time!!! Works very well! Although took forever to actually download.

customer_reviews.title: Don't like
customer_reviews.text: I could not get it to work on ny laptop without downloading a bunch of unnecessary BS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TS4 Verdict
customer_reviews.text: I'd been skeptical of purchasing this game for quite a while. Mainly due to reviews on here. But I have to say, I'm glad I eventually caved and bought it. It's a nice game, played it for about 99 hours so far since I got it. And yes, I only have the BASE game. It might just be a preference thing, but I enjoy TS4 a lot. I don't mind the small lots and little travel because I rarely ever had my sims go anywhere in TS3. So TS4 works just fine for me. Patches have likely made this game better overall since it's debut, and it will likely just continue to get better. In all, I recommend the game.
customer_reviews.author: Quill

customer_reviews.title: Code useless stay away
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and code that was sent to download game " has already been redeemed" therefore we could not download rendering it a useless purchase. Steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: So much fun. Easy download on the Mac and works well
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. Easy download on the Mac and works well. You can easily lose a couple hours messing with these Sims and not even realize it. I cannot really compare it to prior versions as I have not played it in awhile, but it seems pretty good to me!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M

customer_reviews.title: Just get it already
customer_reviews.text: Installed perfectly and it was $20!!!! Had I purchased it on Origin or at GameStop it would’ve costed me $40. Plus I had prime points which covered the cost completely. The game is great and I had no problems installing it. If you’re considering getting it, I’d say just go for it because it’s a really great game.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Veronica Pando

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy for mac
customer_reviews.text: I like the game but I didn't know that you could not use the discs to download the game for Mac and that it was only PC compatible and then the whole process of downloading origin and then the actual game took about two full days for some reason. Origin was selling the game itself for only $14.00 and for this I paid $40.00​
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Scam
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy a used disc of SIMS because the code you receive with the dice is good for only a one time use. AKA if someone uses the disc to install the game and redeems the code that came with the disc, you will be unable to use the code that comes with the disc. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Heiberg

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: It's the Sims.....you love them or you hate them.....need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Fratianni

customer_reviews.title: Fun, it would seem.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 year old daughter. She loves it. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: D. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Game Rocks
customer_reviews.text: My child is enjoying this game very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: val23

customer_reviews.title: Cool version
customer_reviews.text: If you've played the sims and liked those you will like this one as well. Has a lot of add on or "expansion packs" for purchase if you'd like. I've been playing it for months and I'm still interested.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: The game works but isn't as good as Sims 3
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, but the cost for all the expansions is so much and it still isn't as good as Sims 3.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: I love the Sims!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've spent many nights and mornings playing this game. I love that I literally can do whatever I want. Installing mods is optional but for me, that made the experience even better.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Typical Sims game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game, but it's a bit repetitive to me.
customer_reviews.author: okay_sure

product_meta.title: The Sims 4 - PC/Mac
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC / Mac| Edition:Standard 

The Sims 4 is a life simulation game that gives you the power to create and control people in a virtual world and play with life. Express your creativity as you customize your Sims distinct appearances and unique personalities. Build your Sims the perfect home with design options for you to shape its appearance on the outside and inside. Play with the moments of your Sims lives. Build relationships with other Sims; pursue new careers and develop unique skills for your Sims. Explore beautiful game worlds full of interesting Sims to meet and venues to visit. Your Sims can travel between game worlds to check out a variety of unique environments and locations. Who will your Sims be and what’s the stories will you create? It’s up to you. Have fun, be powerful, and play with life in The Sims 4.





 * Create Your Sims: You can create who you want in The Sims 4. You can customize your Sims distinct appearances including sculpting their body shape and choosing from a variety of ethnicities, hairstyles; clothing options, and the accessories that make your Sims unique people. Select your Sims personality traits and determine their aspiration in life. You can create and play with multiple Sims. 

 * Build Your Sims the Perfect Home: Effortlessly customize its appearance from the outside and inside including furnishings, landscapes, and neighborhood locations. You can even add unique features like pools and basements for your Sims home.* Be inspired by curated, Styled Rooms that you can easily add to your game.

 * Play with Life: Have fun and be powerful when you play with life in The Sims 4. Your choices shape the rich and entertaining moments you create with your Sims lives. Who will your Sims be? What will they become? Pursue their dream job; develop their skills; make them new friends or start a family when you build relationships other Sims. You can creatively play in your own unique way in The Sims 4. 



 * Explore Beautiful Game Worlds: Explore the beautiful, worlds of The Sims 4 full of rich communities of Sims and interesting venues to visit. Your Sims can travel between game worlds to check out the unique environments and locations of each world. Expand your Sims social circle and meet new Sims in each world’s vibrant neighborhoods and unique destinations.
feature_bullets: Create unique sims: A variety of sims are yours to personalize, each with distinct appearances, dynamic personalities, and inspiring aspirations
Build the perfect home: Construct the home of your, and their dreams by planning its layout, choosing furnishings, and altering the landscape and terrain
Explore vibrant worlds: Travel between locations, discover amazing and distinctive neighborhoods, and encounter captivating venues
Play with life: Control the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims’ lives from their relationships to their careers
